STANDARD RULES FOR HOMECHOICE COMPETITIONS
1. The promoter is homechoice (Pty) Ltd ("the Promoter").
2. The promotional competition is open to all customers whose accounts are in good standing, who are South African residents, or residents of Namibia, Botswana, Swaziland, Zambia and Lesotho, who are in possession of a valid identity document, except any director, member, partner, employee, agent or consultant of the Promoter, the marketing service providers or any person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by these entities, including their spouses, life partners, business partners or immediate family members.
3. All participants indemnify the company against any and all claims of any nature whatsoever arising out of and/or from their participation in this competition. The company is not liable for any defect in the prizes. The company reserves the right to substitute prizes with any other prize of comparable commercial value.
4. Entries that are unclear, illegible or contain errors will be declared invalid.
5. The company will use reasonable efforts to contact grand prize winners during working hours (between 8am and 5pm) either telephonically or via e-mail on the contact number or e-mail address as provided by the winners. homechoice will endeavour to contact the potential prize winner within two weeks from draw date.
6. The potential prize winner may be required to provide or verify their name, surname, ID number, telephone number and physical address with a homechoice representative. The potential prize winner is not an actual winner until his / her submission is validated and satisfies the qualifying criterion set by the promoter. If a potential prize winner does not meet the eligibility requirements, the prize will be forfeited.
7. If the company is unable to reach any person after drawing his/her entry for whatsoever reason, such person will be disqualified and the draw of a replacement entry shall take place in the same manner as the first draw.
8. The Promoter shall not be responsible for any lost, damaged or delayed entries for any reason whatsoever. Proof of sending will not be accepted as proof of receipt.
9. The Promoter reserves the right to disqualify any claim if fraud or cheating is suspected, including without limitation, through the manipulation of code or otherwise falsifying data.
10. NOTE: Any attempt to use multiple e-mail accounts or other tactics to enter more than the stated limit may result in disqualification and all associated entries will be void. Entries generated by script, macro, bot, commercial contest subscription, incentives or other means not sponsored by the Promoter, entering service sites or any other automated means and entries by any means that subvert the entry process or do not conform to the terms or spirit of these competition rules, will void the entry and may disqualify the entrant.
11. The company may require winners to complete an information disclosure document and/or indemnification to ensure compliance with these rules and the Consumer Protection Act 68 of 2008. Should any winner refuse or be unable to comply, such winner will be deemed to have rejected the prize.
12. The company may require winners be identified and/or photographed and the photographs published in printed or electronic media. The winners will be given the opportunity to decline to the publication of their images and to participate in marketing material in so far as it relates to the competition.
13. The Promoter shall have the right to change or terminate the promotional competition and without notice, for any reason which the Promoter reasonably deems necessary.
14. In the event of such change or termination, all participants agree to waive any rights that they have in respect of this promotional competition and acknowledge that they will have no recourse against the Promoter or its agents.
15. Neither the Promoter, its agents, its associated companies, nor any directors, officers or employees of such, shall be liable for any loss or damage, whether direct, indirect, consequential or otherwise arising from any cause whatsoever, which may be suffered by the participant.
16. Participation in the promotion constitutes acceptance of the promotional rules and participants agree to abide by the rules, which will be interpreted by the company’s appointed judges, whose decision regarding any dispute will be final and binding.
17. In the event that the prize is not available despite the Promoter's reasonable endeavours to procure the prize, the Promoter reserves the right to substitute prizes of equal value.
18. For prizes other than cash, unless it is specifically provided for and allowed in the marketing material, the prize(s) are neither transferable nor redeemable for cash. Prizes are subject to availability and the company may substitute prizes for alternative products or services of similar value.
19. The Promoter assumes no liability whatsoever for any entry that has been omitted from participation for any reason whatsoever. The Promoter is not liable for any technical failures affecting the participation and/or voucher redemption process of the promotion.
20. The winners’ details (name and home town only) will be available after the draw date, on receipt of a stamped, self-addressed envelope. Write to The Prize Draw Administrator, Pvt Bag X123, Claremont 7735. Prize Winners’ names, locations and photos may also appear on the homechoice website and mobisite, and Facebook, Twitter and Pinterest pages for up to 12 months. Winners may refuse to have their photos shown.
21. All entries received via the homechoice Facebook page are subject to above rules.
22. A copy of these rules can be obtained at no cost to the participant from The Prize Draw Administrator at Pvt Bag X123, Claremont 7735 or 78 Main Road Wynberg, Cape Town.
23. This draw is run in accordance with the Consumer Protection Act.
    1. The Promoter
  1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
  2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
  3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    1. How to enter
  5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
    1. Place a successful order during the competition period and that order must be successfully despatched.
  6. The competition runs from 27 January 2023 00:00:00 to 2 March 2023 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
      1. Winners will be drawn randomly per week for the following periods:
      • 27 January 2023 – 3 February 2023 (8 winners a day, 40 winners a week)
      • 4 February 2023- 10 February 2023 (7 winners a day, 35 winners a week)
      • 11 February 2023 -17 February 2023 (7 winners a day, 35 winners a week)
      • 18 February 2023 -24 February 2023 (7 winners a day, 35 winners a week)
      • 25 February 2023 -2 March 2023 (6 winners a day, 30 winners a week)
    1. Entry into the competition is NOT limited per person. Each successfully despatched order qualifies for an entry.
    2. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    3. There will be 175 winners who will receive a R1000 SPUR meal voucher (“the Prize”).
    4. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
    5. The voucher is issued by DeRisk will be sent to winners via SMS or email
    6. Meal vouchers are valid for 3 years from issue.
      1. The Draw
    7. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    8. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    9. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    10. The winners will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    11. Winners may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    12. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    13. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    14. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    15. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    16. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    17. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    18. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    19. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    20. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.
      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    5. You acknowledge that by submitting your entry to the competition that you have been given an appropriate opportunity to first read these terms and conditions before entering and that you understand and agree to these terms and conditions.
      1. How to enter
    6. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Purchase any participating SMEG product and this order must be successfully despatched.
      1. Participating products are limited to:
      • SMEG RETRO BLENDER BLACK
      • SMEG RETRO BLENDER CREAM
      • SMEG 1.7L RETRO KETTLE BLACK
      • SMEG 1.7L RETRO KETTLE RED
      • SMEG 1.7L RETRO KETTLE CREAM
      • SMEG 2 SLICE RETRO TOASTER BLACK
      • SMEG 2 SLICE RETRO TOASTER RED
      • SMEG 2 SLICE RETRO TOASTER CREAM
      • SMEG RETRO DRIP FILTER COFFEE MACHINE BLACK
      • SMEG RETRO DRIP FILTER COFFEE MACHINE RED
      • SMEG RETRO DRIP FILTER COFFEE MACHINE CREAM
    7. The competition runs from 5 February 2023 00:00:00 to 28 February 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    8. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    9. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    10. There will be 1 winner who will receive a SMEG Retro Stand Mixer (Red) worth R14 499 (“the Prize”).
    11. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    12. The winner/s will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    13. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. live in the Republic of South Africa;
      3. provide correct and full personal details, as required;
      4. not be a juristic entity and must be an individual;
      5. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      6. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      7. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      8. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    14. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. This time frame is subject to change by the Promotors without notice. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    15. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days 48 hours, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    16. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    17. The names of the prize winner/s will be published on the HomeChoice website and/or social media platform subject to the winner/s consent. HomeChoice may request to will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, subject to the winner/s consent. unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    18. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    19. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    20. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    21. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    22. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    23. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    24. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    25. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.
      1. The Promoter
    1. homechoice (Pty) Limited (“homechoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. homechoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”)
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
      1. Place a successful order during the competition period and that order must be successfully despatched.
    6. The competition runs from 3 February 2023 00:00:00 to 2 March 2023 23:59:59 in the homechoice outbound (Telemarketing) channel for all customers placing successful orders through this channel.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to one (1) entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although homechoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be four (4) winners who will each win R10 000 cash (“the Prize”). One winner will be drawn for the below periods until the competition ends.
      • 2 February 2023-11 February 2023
      • 12 February 2023-18 February 2023
      • 19 February 2023-25 February 2023
      • 26 February 2023 -2 March 2023
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value. The prize money will only be paid to winners once order has successfully despatched.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draws will take place weekly until the required amount of winners have been selected. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winners will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website.
      1. General
    15. Winners may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winners’ name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winners will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability, however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must :
      1. Place a successful order during the competition period and that order must be successfully despatched.
    6. The competition runs from 1 January 2023 2022 00:00:00 to 26 January 2023 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels .
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person, unless entries are received via the website or mobi-page in which case a maximum of [insert] entries per person are allowed. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 4 winners who will receive R10 000 cash (“the Prize”).
    10. The Prize is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
      1. One winner will be drawn randomly per week for the following periods:
      • 1 January 2023- 7 January 2023
      • 8 January 2023 -14 January 2023
      • 15 January 2023 -21 January 2023
      • 22 January 2023 -26 January 2023
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.

      1. How to enter
    6. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      • Visit the page: https://www.pages03.net/homechoice/Winaloadsheddingbundle_Sign_upDECJAN/
    7. and fill in the required details.
    8. The competition runs from 29 Nov 2022 00:00:00 to 28 Jan 2023 23:59:59 on the HomeChoice website.
    9. Entry into the Competition is limited to 1 per person. The Promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    10. Your entries must reach us before the closing date and stipulated time of the competition as specified in clause 8 above. Please note that an entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, we will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    11. There will be 1 winner who will receive a Loadshedding bundle worth R13000 (“the Prize”).
    12. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    13. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    14. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    15. The Prize draw will take place on the 29 Jan 2023 after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner(s) will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    16. The winner(s) will be contacted via e-mail and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner(s) to receive their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner(s) despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner(s) and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner(s) will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winner(s), once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites, and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    17. Winner(s) may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    18. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name(s) and/or photograph(s) in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    19. The winner(s) will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner(s) may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for them to receive it.
    20. We may require winner(s) to provide us with additional information in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
    21. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    22. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    23. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    24. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    25. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    26. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of the Prize.
      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    5. You acknowledge that by submitting your entry to the competition that you have been given an appropriate opportunity to first read these terms and conditions before entering and that you understand and agree to these terms and conditions.
      1. How to enter
    6. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Visit any of our 14 showrooms nationwide and place a successful order
    7. The competition runs from 5 December 2022 00:00:00 to 18 December 2022 23:59:59 in all HomeChoice showrooms.
    8. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    9. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    10. There will be 10 winners who will receive a price bundle with a maximum value of R10 000 (“the Prize”).
    11. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    12. The winner/s will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    13. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. live in the Republic of South Africa;
      3. provide correct and full personal details, as required;
      4. not be a juristic entity and must be an individual;
      5. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      6. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      7. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      8. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    14. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. This time frame is subject to change by the Promotors without notice. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    15. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days 48 hours, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    16. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    17. The names of the prize winner/s will be published on the HomeChoice website and/or social media platform subject to the winner/s consent. HomeChoice may request to will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, subject to the winner/s consent. unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    18. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    19. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    20. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.

      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
      1. Place a successful order during the competition period.
    6. The competition runs from 29 November 2022 00:00:00 to 20 December 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.

    9. There will be 22 (twenty-two) winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid (“the Prize”). 20 winners will be drawn randomly during the competition period.
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.

      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draw will take place on the Thursday after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.

    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.

    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. By signing up, you agree to receive electronic and other marketing communication(s) through text, emails and other electronic channels from homechoice and FinChoice Africa about their retail, credit, insurance and other financial services products.
    5. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.

      Visit the page: https://www.pages03.net/homechoice/Winaloadsheddingbundle_Sign_upDECJAN2/ and fill in the required details.

      1. The Promoters
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”) is the Promoter of this Competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-site”).
    3. The Competition is known as the “WIN A MILLION RAND TO CREATE YOUR DREAM HOME” (“the Competition”).
    4. By entering this Competition, you agree that these Competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    5. You may obtain a copy of these Competition rules as follows:
      1. HomeChoice customers: from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    6. The Competition will run for the duration of 1 June 2022 00:00:00 to 28 November 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice channels.
      1. How to enter
    7. To be entered into the Competition, HomeChoice customers must:
      1. Place an order during the Competition period and if that order is not returned for a period of 14 (fourteen) days, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the Competition;
      2. Collections customers qualify for extra entries to the Competition from the period of 9th June 2022 to 28 November 2022
      3. Pay your monthly instalment on or before the 4th of every month to receive an entry for each payment. Ensure your account is not in arrears for a period not longer than 30 (thirty) days to receive 4 (four) additional entries into the draw.
      1. Entry into the Competition
    8. HomeChoice customers are not limited on the number of entries per person.
    9. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the channel of entry utilised.
    10. Your entries must reach us before the closing date and time of the Competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although the Promoters will take all reasonable steps, we will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    11. There will be 1 (one) winner who will receive R1 000 000 (one million rand only) (“the Prize”), which will be paid out in 5 (five) equal disbursements of R200,000 (two hundred thousand rand) over a 5-year period (the "Prize"), the first payment to be made before 31 December 2022 and annually, on the anniversary of the first payment date, thereafter.
    12. If you agree that we can use your name and picture for marketing purposes, we will fly you and a partner to Cape Town for an all-expenses 2-day trip to visit the HomeChoice offices. This trip is separate from the Prize money and is only applicable if we are able to use the winner’s image/footage for promotional purposes.
    13. The Prize shall not be redeemable or transferable unless we agree otherwise. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    14. The winner will be selected by a random draw and the process will be overseen by an attorney or independent accountant who will report on the Competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    15. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the Promoters or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the Competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the Promoters;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice and FinChoice.
    16. The Prize draw will take place within 2 (two) weeks after the closing date of the Competition. The Promoter reserves the right to change this date in their sole discretion. If the winner’s account is in default from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified and the Prize will be awarded to an alternative winner. If none of the winner(s) or alternative winner(s) drawn qualify to receive the Prize, we may conduct a new draw at our discretion.
    17. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive their Prize. If the Promoter is not able to contact the winner within 5 (five) working days, despite reasonable attempts, we reserve the right to disqualify the winner and award the Prize to an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against the Promoters. The winner, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website and mobi-site.
      1. General
    18. The winner may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    19. The Promoters will use the winner’s name and/or photograph(s) in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of the Promoters’ marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    20. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law. The winner will also need to provide proof of identity before receiving the Prize. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for them to receive it.
    21. We may require the winner to provide us with additional information in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
    22. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any Competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the Promoters.

    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
    3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
    5. The promotion runs from 21 October 2022 00:00:00 to 20 December 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    6. In terms of the promotion:
      • Existing customers who meet the credit criteria and purchase any item specified in clause 7 below will have their billing delayed until the 8th of February 2023 on every qualifying order that is placed during the promotion period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies to all HomeChoice products, except large appliances, electronics and all Smeg products.
    8. The benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, at our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the benefit with a benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who return their order in terms of clause 11 or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged at the normal instalment date. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer(s) if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    15. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    16. The benefit is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the benefit.
    17. You hereby indemnify and hold HomeChoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
    1. homechoice (Pty) Limited (“homechoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this promotional offer.
    2. homechoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
    3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
    5. By signing up, you agree to receive electronic and other marketing communication(s) through text, emails and other electronic channels from homechoice and FinChoice Africa about their retail, credit, insurance and other financial services products.
    6. The promotion runs from 02 Oct 00:00:00 to 28 Nov 2022 23:59:59 on the Homechoice website.
      1. Consumers may only enter once and win once in the campaign period.
    7. In terms of the promotion, customers who:
      1. a) Click on the link https://game.triswick.com/homechoice-slot-game click on ‘play game’
      2. b) and enter their requested details, will receive a SMS to their cell phone.
      1. will need to follow the prompts to receive one of the following prizes:
      1. R250 off if they place an order of R899 or more and use code SLOT250 during checkout
      2. Airtime (random R10, R20 or R50 value). Winners of the airtime prize will instantly receive a unique voucher code via SMS on the mobile number provided. To redeem their Airtime voucher, users must dial *120* 1194# and follow the on-screen prompts to submit their unique voucher code and receive their airtime. Airtime voucher codes can only be redeemed once.
      3. One of the following homechoice product prizes
        • Calista 5pc bedcover set worth up to R1499
        • Cruise Max luggage 2pc set worth R2599 with a free togbag
        • Laney 6 piece basic duvet set worth 1299
    8. Homechoice will attempt to contact the winners within 24 hours (and up to 5 consecutive business days) after the draw to disclose her prize and help redeem her prize. If we are unable to get a hold of the winner, we will move on to the next winner. If the customer chooses a lower valued item (see clause 6 (c)) than the original prize, the remainder value cannot be claimed and will be written off.
      1. Any redemption queries can be sent to info@triswick.com
    9. The gift/benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion. Homechoice vouchers can be used online only and are restricted to one voucher per transaction.
    10. homechoice reserves the right to replace the gift/benefit with a gift/benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or, for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    11. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    12. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
    13. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against homechoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    14. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    15. The gift/benefit is provided “as is” and homechoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the gift/benefit.
    16. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless homechoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
      The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FinChoice, a division of HomeChoice and FoneChoice a division of HomeChoice.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      5. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Visit the homechoice Hebron showroom and place a successful order
    6. The competition runs from 27 October 2022 00:00:00 to 29 October 2022 23:59:59 in the Hebron showroom.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      9. The Prize
    9. There will be 5 winners who will each win one of the following prizes (“the Prize”).
      • Hisense 55” UHD Smart TV
      • Cricut Maker 3 Bundle
      • Samsung 32” Feature TV
      • Ferre 60cm 4 Plate Electric Stove
      • Univa 20L Microwave Oven
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      11. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winners will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      15. General
    15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    24. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.

      • Purchase any product/s to the value of between R3000 to R4999 will receive a free pair of Bluetooth® earphones worth R199 with every order that is placed during the promotional period AND that will subsequently be successfully dispatched.
      • Purchase any product/s to the value of R5000 or more will receive a free Bluetooth® speaker worth R345 with every order that is placed during the promotional period AND that will subsequently be successfully dispatched.

      1. How to enter

      • Visit the homechoice Facebook page: comment with a picture on the competition post

    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 (one) entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although homechoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 2 winners who will each receive a 7-piece Infinity cookware set worth R1499 (“the Prize”).
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review.
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter.
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with homechoice
    13. The Prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive the Prize. If homechoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against homechoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the homechoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.

    15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.

    2. homechoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
    3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
    5. The promotion runs from 4 July 2022 00:00:00 to 23 July 2022 23:59:59 on the Homechoice website.
      1. Consumers may only enter once and win once in the campaign period.
    6. In terms of the promotion, customers who:
      1. Click on the link https://game.triswick.com/homechoice-find-the-cookware click on ‘play game’
      2. and enter their requested details, will receive a SMS to their cell phone.
    7. will need to follow the prompts to receive one of the following prizes:
      1. R50 off if they place an order of R1 or more and use code FIND50 during checkout
      2. R100 off if they place an order of R1 or more and use code FIND100 during checkout.
      3. Airtime (random R10, R20 or R30 value). Winners of the airtime prize will instantly receive a unique voucher code via SMS on the mobile number provided. To redeem their Airtime voucher, users must dial *120* 1194# and follow the on-screen prompts to submit their unique voucher code and receive their airtime. Airtime voucher codes can only be redeemed once.
      1. Any redemption queries can be sent to info@triswick.com
    8. The gift/benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion. Homechoice vouchers can be used online only and are restricted to one voucher per transaction.
    9. homechoice reserves the right to replace the gift/benefit with a gift/benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or, for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the gift/benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who do not return a gift dispatched with their order in terms of clause 11, or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged for the normal purchase price of the gift, which will be debited against the customer’s homechoice account on notice. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard homechoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against homechoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    15. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    16. The gift/benefit is provided “as is” and homechoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the gift/benefit.
    17. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless homechoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
    • Honouring the lifetime guarantee is subject to assessment by the Homechoice Product Quality Department.
    • The outcome of the assessment is final.
    • Homechoice retains the right to replace discontinued items with items in the current range in the same product tier.
    • If a product is discontinued from our range, Homechoice will continue to provide spare parts for that item for 5 (five) years after it has been discontinued.
    • The guarantee doesn’t cover damage due to excessive overheating.
    • Pitting is not a result of material defect or faulty workmanship therefore not covered by this guarantee.
    • Damages affected by refurbishing or repair to any of our cookware, by parties other than Homechoice, except when appointed by Homechoice, are not covered by our guarantee.
    • Be sure to always select the correctly sized stove plate for the pot you are using.
    • Don’t allow your cookware’s handles to extend over a hot stove plate – this could result in damage to the handles and will not be covered in this guarantee.
    • Do not leave your cookware unattended while cooking – this could result in dry boiling which causes damage, this will not be covered in this guarantee.
    • Lifetime guarantee will only apply to the cookware itself, this excludes all accessories and gifts.
    • Do not use your cookware on the braai or unregulated open flame. Any damage caused by excessive heat will not be covered by the guarantee.
    • This guarantee does not cover scratches and discolouration.
    • This guarantee does not include damages caused by improper care or using an incorrect cleaning method. Please refer to the care manual supplied for recommended guidelines.
    • This cookware guarantee will service the lifetime of the purchaser. The guarantee is not transferable.

    1. homechoice (Pty) Limited (“homechoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. homechoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”)
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules .
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
      1. Place a successful order during the competition period; order does not have to be despatched at the time of the draw.
    6. The competition runs from 29 May 2022 00:00:00 to 11 June 2022 23:59:59 on the homechoice outbound (Telemarketing) channel for Retention customer only.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to one (1) entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although homechoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be a maximum of one hundred and forty (140) winners who will each win R1000 cash (“the Prize”). Ten (10) winners will be drawn randomly every weekday. If sufficient winners cannot be drawn for Saturday and Sunday draws, the balance will not be carried over to the subsequent weekday draw.
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value. The prize money will only be paid to winners once order has successfully despatched.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draws will take place daily until the required amount of winners have been selected.If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website.

    13. The Prize draw will take place within 14 (fourteen) business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner(s) will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.

If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner(s) despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner(s) and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner(s) will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winner(s), once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites, and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    15. Winner(s) may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name(s) and/or photograph(s) in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner(s) will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner(s) may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for them to receive it.
    18. We may require winner(s) to provide us with additional information in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION, YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    24.
