    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
    3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at https://www.homechoice.co.za/buy-now-pay-later or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
    5. The promotion runs from 22 April 2022 00:00:00 to 28 May 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    6. In terms of the promotion:
      • Existing customers who meet the credit criteria and purchase any item specified in clause 7 below will have their billing delayed until 8th of August 2022 on every qualifying order that is placed during the promotion period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies to all HomeChoice blankets, excluding other product catagories.
    8. The benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, at our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the benefit with a benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit and must return any gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who return their order in terms of clause 11 or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged at the normal instalment date. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”)
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
      1. Place a successful order during the competition period.
    6. The competition runs from 1 April 2022 00:00:00 to 30 April 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 30 (thirty) winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid (“the Prize”). 30 winners will be drawn randomly:
      • 1 April- 9 April 2022 (9 winners will be drawn randomly for this period)
      • 10 April – 16 April 2022 (7 winners will be drawn randomly for this period)
      • 17 April- 23 April 2022 (7 winners will be drawn randomly for this period)
      • 24 April -30 April 2022 (7 winners will be drawn randomly for this period)
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draw will take place on the Thursday after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website.

      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
    5. You acknowledge that by submitting your entry to the competition, you have been given an appropriate opportunity to first read these terms and conditions before entering and that you understand and agree to these terms and conditions. You also agree to receive electronic and other marketing communications through text, emails and other electronic channels from HomeChoice and FinChoice Africa about your retail, credit, insurance and other financial services products. Your personal information will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy, read more at https://www.homechoice.co.za/hc-privacy-policy.
      1. How to enter
    6. To be automatically entered into the competition:
      1. Visit www.homechoice.co.za and click on the link: www.homechoice.co.za/design-a-blanket-competition-2022 to submit your entry. Files must be sent in the below format and requirements to competitions@homechoice.co.za.
      2. Your entry files must not exceed 5mb file size and 200x230cm.
      3. Before you start your design, it is important to know the difference between a jacquard woven design and a printed design. A jacquard design is woven into the blanket itself as it is produced on a loom. A printed design is applied to the surface of the blanket after the fabric has been produced.
      4. Because of this fundamental difference in the production process, your use of colour is also quite different. The weaving process limits the way you use colour in your design. The maximum number of colours you can use in a single design is 8. You can also only have 2 colours working together at the same time. If you look at any horizontal line running across the design, there can only be 2 colours in that line.
      5. The winning design may be simplified for manufacturing purposes.
      6. You need to submit your own original design(s), not someone else’s design. Pictures or screenshot of other designs are not allowed.
      7. HomeChoice will own the winning design and winner(s) will not own any royalties from the sales.
    7. The competition runs from 27 February 2022 00:00:00 to 26 March 23:59:59 on the HomeChoice website.
    8. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    9. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 7 above. Please note that the entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    10. There will be 3 winners who will receive the following (“the Prize”):
      • Winner - R5000 cash and a sample of the winning blanket
      • First runner-up - R3000 cash
      • Second runner-up - R1000 cash
    11. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    12. The winners will be selected by a panel of expert judges and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    13. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. live in the Republic of South Africa;
      3. provide correct and full personal details, as required;
      4. not be a juristic entity and must be an individual;
      5. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      6. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      7. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (f);
      8. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice/FinChoice and/or FoneChoice.
    14. The Prize draw will take place within fourteen (14) business days after the closing date of the competition. This time frame is subject to change by the promoters without notice. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    15. The winner(s) will be contacted via e-mail and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner(s) to receive their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 48 hours, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.

      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Make a purchase during the period of 21 February 2022 to 17 March 2022, you will qualify for 1 (one) entry into the draw.
      2. Make a purchase during the period of 18 March 2022 to 24 March 2022, you will qualify for 2 (two) entries into the draw.
      3. Successfully be dispatched from our warehouse.
      4. Pay your February 2022 instalment by 4 March 2022 and you will qualify for 1 (one) entry into the draw.
      5. Pay your “now due” instalment as reflected on your statement by 4 March 2022 and receive 2 (two) entries into the draw.
    6. The competition runs from 21 February 2022 00:00:00 to 24 March 2022 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice outbound channels (telemarketing) and on all other HomeChoice channels from 25 February 2022 00:00:00 to 24 March 2022 23:59:59 (“the Competition Period”).

      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 1 (one) winner who will receive a Suzuki S-Presso 1.0 GL MT (2021) (“the Prize”).
    10. On written request form the winner, the Prize shall be redeemable for cash to the maximum limit of R200 000, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
    11. HomeChoice shall be responsible to pay for the costs of delivery, the initial licence fee and registration costs to register the vehicle in your name.
    12. The winner will be allowed a pre-delivery service inspection and thereafter, the vehicle will be delivered “as is”.
    13. Insurance, services, repairs, fuel and maintenance and yearly registration fees shall be for the winner’s account.
    14. Thorp Motor Group shall extend a minimum warranty and service schedule for the vehicle, which on delivery shall be transferred to the winner. All services, repairs and warranties related to the vehicle will be between Thorp and the winner. It is recorded that all risks and benefits associated with the vehicle shall pass to the winner upon delivery. Delivery shall be complete once the vehicle key has been handed over to the winner.
    15. Delivery of the vehicle will be limited within the borders of South Africa. Foreign customers may be permitted to enter the competition, however the vehicle will be delivered to a convenient location within South Africa at the sole discretion of HomeChoice. All fees and licensing, and insurance associated with transference of the vehicle across border shall be for the winner’s account.

    16. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    17. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. Hold a valid South African drivers licence;
      3. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      4. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      5. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling of any of the persons specified in (d);
      6. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    18. The Prize draw will take place within 14 (fourteen) business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified and another winner will be selected.

      will need to follow the prompts to receive one of the following prizes:
      1. R50 off if they place an order of R1 or more and use code WIN50 during checkout
      2. R100 off if they place an order of R1 or more and use code WIN100 during checkout
      3. Airtime (random R10, R20 or R30 value). Winners of the airtime prize will instantly receive a unique voucher code via SMS on the mobile number provided. To redeem their Airtime voucher, users must dial *120*25425# and follow the on-screen prompts to submit their unique voucher code and receive their airtime. Airtime voucher codes can only be redeemed once.
      Any redemption queries can be sent to info@triswick.com

      1. Make a purchase of any value during the competition period

    9. There will be 1 winner who will receive R200 000 for a home makeover (“the Prize”). The winner will be drawn randomly.
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with homechoice/FinChoice.
    13. The prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If homechoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against homechoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the homechoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. homechoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of homechoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against homechoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    23. The Prize is provided “as is” and homechoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
    24. You hereby indemnify and hold homechoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, subcontractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any prize.
      1. The Promoters
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”) is the promoter of this Competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-site at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-site”).
    3. The competition is known as “DECEMBER 2021 WIN A MILLION BEFORE CHRISTMAS” (“the Competition”).
    4. By entering this Competition, you agree that these Competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    5. You may obtain a copy of these Competition rules as follows:
      1. HomeChoice customers: from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    6. To be entered into the Competition:
      1. HomeChoice Customers must:
        • Place an order during the Competition period and that order has been dispatched from our warehouse, you will receive 1 (one) entry into the Competition; or
        • Pay your December installment on or before the 18th December 2021 and receive 2 (two) entries into the draw, provided that your account is in good standing.
        • Should your account be in arrears for a period not longer than 30 (thirty) days, pay your December installment on or before 18 December 2021 and receive 1 (one) entry into the draw.
    7. The Competition runs from 21 November 2021 00:00:00 to 20 December 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice outbound channels (showrooms, sales agents and telemarketing) and on all other HomeChoice channels (electronic) from 28 November 2021 00:00:00 to 20 December 2021 23:59:59 (“the Competition Period”).
    8. Entry into the Competition:
      1. HomeChoice Customers are limited to 4 (four) entries per person.
    9. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the channel of entry utilised.
    10. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the Competition specified in clause 7 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although the Promoters will take all reasonable steps, we will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    11. There will be 1 (one) winner who will receive R1 000 000 (one million Rands only) (“the Prize”) which will be paid out in five equal disbursements of R200,000 (two hundred thousand rand) over a 5-year period (the "Prize"), the first payment to be made by 24 December 2021 and annually thereafter.
    12. The Prize shall not be redeemable for any other item and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    13. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an attorney or independent accountant who will also report on the Competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    14. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the Promoters or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the Competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the Promoters;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice and FinChoice
    15. The prize draw will take place within 2 (two) business days after the closing date of the Competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified and the prize will be awarded to an alternative winner. If none of the winner(s) or alternative winners drawn qualify to receive the Prize, we may conduct a new draw at our discretion.
    16. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive his/her Prize. If the Promoters are not able to contact the winner within 5 (five) working days, despite reasonable attempts, we reserve the right to disqualify the winner and award the Prize to an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against the Promoters. The winner, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website and mobi-site.
      1. General
    17. The winner may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    18. The Promoters will use the winner’s name and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of the Promoters’ marketing, unless the Winner objects to such use in writing.
    19. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity before receiving the Prize. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    20. We may require the winner to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
    21. The Promoters reserve the right, in their sole discretion, to cancel vary, or suspend any Competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the Promoters.
    22. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    23. If a Competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the Competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against the Promoters, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    24. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    25. The Prize is provided “as is” and the Promoters disclaim liability, however, arising out of your use of the Prize.

    5. The promotion runs from 22 October 2021 00:00:00 to 21 December 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    6. In terms of the promotion:
      • Existing customers who meet the credit criteria and purchase any item specified in clause 7 below will have their billing delayed until 8th of February 2022 on every qualifying order that is placed during the promotion period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies to all HomeChoice products, except large appliances and electronics.
    8. The benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, at our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the benefit with a benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who return their order in terms of clause 11 or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged at the normal instalment date. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the discretion of the promotor.

If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

You hereby indemnify and hold HomeChoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Visit the page: https://www.pages03.net/homechoice/HC-POPI-Mattress-and-base-set-Campaign/
    6. The competition runs from 3 October 2021 00:00:00 to 23 October 23:59:59 on the HomeChoice website
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 1 winner who will receive a Rest Assured mattress and base set worth R5 000 (“the Prize”).
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 48 hours, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    15. Winner may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. The names of the prize winner/s will be published on the HomeChoice website and/or social media platform subject to the winner/s consent. HomeChoice may request to will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, subject to the winner/s consent. for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

      1. Purchase any product/s to the value of R999 or more, will receive a free handbag worth R199 with every order that is placed during the promotional period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies only to the all products:
    8. The gift and benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the gift/benefit with a gift/benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock, or for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the gift/benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who do not return a gift dispatched with their order in terms of clause 11, or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged for the normal purchase price of the gift, which will be debited against the customer’s HomeChoice account on notice. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.

    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this promotional offer.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”).
    3. These terms regulate the promotion and will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these terms from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules or from competitions@homechoice.co.za.
    5. The promotion runs from 10 September 2021 00:00:00 to 31 January 2022 23:59:59 in all HomeChoice showrooms countrywide.
    6. In terms of the promotion, customers who:
      1. Have received their COVID-19 vaccination and provide proof of it
      2. visit our showrooms during the promotion period, place an order of R1499 or more and you will receive a R100 HomeChoice voucher with every order that is placed during the promotion period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies only to all products and is limited to the first 500 qualifying customers.
    8. The gift and benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the gift/benefit with a gift/benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or, for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the gift/benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who do not return a gift dispatched with their order in terms of clause 11, or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged for the normal purchase price of the gift, which will be debited against the customer’s HomeChoice account on notice. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    15. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    16. The gift/benefit is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the gift/benefit.
    17. You hereby indemnify and hold HomeChoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      • Visit the Homechoice Facebook page: Comment on our post to tell us what is your family’s favourite recipe,
      • tag us by using #myhomechoice and #heritageday2021
      • tag a friend to share their #myhomechoice story too
      • Like and share this post and our page
    6. The competition runs from 5 September 2021 00:00:00 to 18 September 2021 23:59:59 on the HomeChoice FaceBook page.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 1 winner who will receive R10 000 cash (“the Prize”).
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may, in our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. not be under debt review or in the process of applying for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter.
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The Prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive the Prize. If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
      • We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
    18. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    19. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    20. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    21. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    22. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability, however, arising out of your use of the Prize.
    23. You hereby indemnify and hold HomeChoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of the Prize.

      1. How to enter:
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Buy any bedding item during the promotional period
    6. The competition runs from 29 August 2021 00:00:00 to 18 September 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 21 (twenty-one) winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid (“the Prize”). 21 winners will be drawn randomly. (“the Prize”).
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older;
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draw will take place within 14 business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winners will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.

    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. He We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.

      1. Who visit any of our showrooms and make a purchase of R1499 or more
      will receive a R200 voucher with the first qualifying order that is placed during the promotion period AND that is subsequently successfully dispatched.
    7. The promotion applies to all products.
    8. The benefit attached to this promotion shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise, in our discretion.
    9. HomeChoice reserves the right to replace the benefit with a benefit of a similar value should this be required due to items being out of stock or, for any other reason whatsoever at their sole discretion.
    10. Customers who return their order for any reason will forfeit their right to the benefit and must return the gift in its original packaging and without being used.
    11. Customers who do not return a gift dispatched with their order in terms of clause 11, or who do not return it in its original packaging and without being used, agree to be charged for the normal purchase price of the gift, which will be debited against the customer’s HomeChoice account on notice. In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).

      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”)
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition, you must:
      1. Place a successful order during the promotion period.
    6. The competition runs from 8 August 2021 00:00:00 to 14 August 2021 23:59:59 on all HomeChoice sales channels.
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 7 (seven) winners who will not be billed for the despatched order which entered them into the draw (“the Prize”). That is, they will win their order for free. If the winning customer has paid cash for the order, they will be reimbursed for the amount paid (“the Prize”). 7 winners will be drawn randomly.
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise at our discretion. We may, at our discretion, decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winners will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child or sibling of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice
    13. The prize draw will take place on the Thursday after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website.
      1. General
    15. Winners may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation, and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured at the reasonable discretion of the promoter.

      • Visit the page: https://www.pages03.net/homechoice/HC-POPI-Adena-Blanket-Combo-Competition/

      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 4 winner who will receive an Adena mink blanket combo worth R1999 (“the Prize”). 1 winner will be randomly drawn for each week of the competition period
      • Week 1 runs from 30 June-3 July
      • Week 2 runs from 4 July- 10 July 2021
      • Week 3 runs 11 July -17 July 2021
      • Week 4 runs from 18 July-24 July 2021
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner/s will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.

In this instance, the gift will be treated as a credit purchase on the date as specified in the notice. The standard HomeChoice credit terms and conditions, including credit costs, will apply to it.
    12. A customer will forfeit his or her right to the gift/benefit associated with the promotion if he or she is (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the promotional offer, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
    13. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any promotional offer if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the discretion of the promotor.
    14. If the promotional offer is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all qualifying customers agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the promotional offer and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    15. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the promotional offer terms will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    16. The gift/benefit is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the gift/benefit.
    17. You hereby indemnify and hold HomeChoice harmless (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this promotional offer and/or the award of any gift/benefit.
      1. The Promoter
    1. HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FinChoice, a division of HomeChoice and FoneChoice a division of HomeChoice.
    2. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at m.homechoice.co.za (“mobi-page”).
    3. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
    4. You may obtain a copy of these competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules.
      1. How to enter
    5. To be automatically entered into the competition you must:
      1. Visit any of our 14 showrooms on 19-20 June 2021 and make a purchase in-store.
    6. The competition runs from 19 June 2021 00:00:00 to 20 June 2021 23:59:59 in all homechoice showrooms
    7. Entry into the competition is limited to 1 entry per person. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to amend the rules relating to the number of entries per person depending on the sales channel utilised.
    8. Your entries must reach us before the closing time of the competition specified in clause 6 above. Please note that entry may be through an electronic platform. Although HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
      1. The Prize
    9. There will be 14 winner who will receive a 22-piece Wahl Clipper and Trimmer bundle worth R799 (“the Prize”). One winner will be drawn randomly for each of the below showrooms:
      • Wynberg
      • Maponya
      • East London
      • Rissik Street
      • Nelspruit
      • Pretoria
      • Bloemfontein
      • Port Elizabeth
      • Mamelodi
      • Queenstown
      • Rustenburg
      • Thembisa
      • Promenade
      • Kathlehong
    10. The Prize shall not be redeemable for cash and is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion. We may in our discretion decide to substitute the Prize with similar goods of a similar value.
      1. The Draw
    11. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
    12. In order to qualify as a winner, you must:
      1. be 18 years or older
      2. not be under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review;
      3. not be a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter;
      4. not be the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (c);
      5. be up to date with all accounts/credit agreements with HomeChoice.
    13. The prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
    14. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s). If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts, within 5 days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. Winners, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice and FinChoice websites and mobi-pages.
      1. General
    15. Winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
    16. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
    17. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive the Prize.
    18. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of a prize.
    19. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured in the reasonable discretion of the promoter.
    20. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
    21. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
    22. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
    23. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.

    14. The winner/s will be contacted via email and/or SMS and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner/s to receive his/her/their Prize(s).
